descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ff0000]ALL RIGHTS ARE FOR ACE VOYAGE PRODUCTIONS.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Nothing may be copied, used or uploaded else where without permission from Ace Voyage Productions[/color]

[color=#ff0000]Credits to:[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Mr. Boafist (Harm Groote) for helping me with the music ([url=https://www.facebook.com/BFLAVP/]Brothers for Life[/url])

My facebook group[/color] [url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/SkyrimHunters/?fref=ts]Skyrim Hunters

[/url][color=#ff0000]Racendier for making [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38164/?]Witch of the wild[/url]

This mod replaces the Bethesda logo at the launch of Skyrim[/b]



[youtube]u_FQhTSV3bg[/youtube]

[b][color=#ff0000]How to install:[/color][/b]

Download manually
Unzip file
Go to "Data" folder
Go to "Video" folder
Change "BGS_Logo" into "OLD_BSG_Logo
Copy/paste file
Done.


[color=#f4f4f4]An optional file has been added:[/color]

[color=#f4f4f4]Choose only 1![/color]

[youtube]jkOA4-cpuKo[/youtube]

[color=#00ffff][size=3]NOTE:[/size][/color]

[color=#f4f4f4]Both replacers do NOT contain the AVP Logo or the text "This is an AVP Production"[/color]
[color=#f4f4f4]I have put the text and logo in the video to make sure people know who made the video and because of copyrights

[b][color=#3c78d8]HIGHLY RECOMMENDED:[/color] 

[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76312?]Symphonique main menu music replacers by [b]Ace Voyage[/b][/url]

[/color]Recommended:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76363/?]Menu replacer the Witch of Skyrim by [b]Ace Voyage[/b] [/url]
author: Ace Voyage
